00049 //
00050 // RawTextParser
00051 //
00052 // 10 February 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_RAWTEXTPARSER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_RAWTEXTPARSER_HPP
00057 
00058 #define PARSER_MAX_WORD_LENGTH (30)
00059 
00060 class RawTextParser {
00061 private:
00062   std::ifstream _in;
00063   char* _buffer;
00064   char* _current;
00065   int _bufferSize;
00066 
00067 public:
00068   RawTextParser( int memorySize = 1024*1024 ) {
00069     _bufferSize = memorySize;
00070     _buffer = new char[_bufferSize]; // let's hope that 1mb is enough for any docs we're gonna see
00071   }
00072 
00073   ~RawTextParser() {
00074     delete _buffer;
00075   }
00076 
00077   bool open( const std::string& fileName ) {
00078     _in.open( fileName.c_str(), std::ifstream::in );
00079     return _in.good();
00080   }
00081 
00082   void close() {
00083     _in.close();
00084   }
00085 
00089 
00090   bool parseDocument( std::string& docName, greedy_vector<char*>& words ) { 
00091     static const char docPrefix[] = "<DOC>";
00092     static const char endDocPrefix[] = "</DOC>";
00093     static const char docnoPrefix[] = "<DOCNO ";
00094     static const char urlPrefix[] = "<URL";
00095     bool gotDocID = false;
00096     int bufferPos = 0;
00097 
00098     while( 1 ) {
00099       int remainingSpace = _bufferSize - bufferPos;
00100       _in.getline( _buffer + bufferPos, remainingSpace );
00101       int length = _in.gcount();
00102 
00103       if( _in.rdstate() & (std::ifstream::failbit|std::ifstream::eofbit) ) {
00104         if( _in.rdstate() & std::ifstream::eofbit ) {
00105           return false; // at end of file, we're done
00106         }
00107         
00108         if( length == remainingSpace - 1 ) {
00109           throw Exception( "RawTextParser", "Buffer size is too small to handle some document in the corpus, use -parserMemory to change." );
00110         }
00111 
00112         if( _in.rdstate() & std::ifstream::failbit ) {
00113           throw Exception( "RawTextParser", "Unable to recover from failed read" );
00114         }
00115       }
00116 
00117       _buffer[bufferPos+length] = 0;
00118       char* line = _buffer + bufferPos;
00119 
00120       if( length && _buffer[bufferPos] == '<' ) {
00121         if( length > sizeof docnoPrefix-1 && !strncmp( docnoPrefix, line, sizeof docnoPrefix-1 ) ) {
00122           docName.assign( line+sizeof docnoPrefix-1, line + length - 2 );
00123           gotDocID = true;
00124         } else if ( length > sizeof endDocPrefix-1 && !strncmp( endDocPrefix, line, sizeof endDocPrefix-1 ) ) {
00125           // handle end doc -- return
00126           if( gotDocID )
00127             return true;
00128         }
00129       } else {
00130         if( !gotDocID )
00131           continue;
00132 
00133         int i = 0;
00134 
00135         while(1) {
00136           for( ; isspace(line[i]) && i<length && line[i]; i++ )
00137             ;
00138 
00139           if( i>= length || !line[i] )
00140             break;
00141 
00142           char* begin = &line[i];
00143 
00144           for( ; !isspace(line[i]) && i<length && line[i]; i++ )
00145             ;
00146 
00147           line[i] = 0;
00148           i++;
00149 
00150           if( &line[i] - begin > PARSER_MAX_WORD_LENGTH )
00151             begin[PARSER_MAX_WORD_LENGTH-1] = 0;
00152 
00153           words.push_back(begin);
00154         }
00155       }
00156 
00157       bufferPos += length + 1; // have to skip trailing \0
00158     }
00159   }
00160 };
00161 
00162 #endif // INDRI_RAWTEXTPARSER_HPP
